TopicTitle: AeroJet Space and Aero .Ltd Stock aircrafts and Space Crafts

Articles.Content:
This company is partnered with KASA to bring the most unique and useful crafts. There maybe returning veteran aircrafts

The AeroDrone

Description: The AeroDrone is one of the most unusual planes that KSA has built. It was originally intended for testing the aerodynamics. The Kerbonauts takes this out on weekends for fun and some even take out the craft on lunch break. This has cause some major annoyance for the Scientist and the workers as it pass by them and crashes into major components of the space center usually leaving a large dent in some buildings. Yeah.. so just don't make the scientist mad.

Features: Can turn in high-g maneuvers

Has two AA batteries and

Powered by a Rockomax 48-7S

Download at Kerbalx

http://kerbalx.com/ouion/AeroDrone

XF-Excelsus

Note: Wrong spelling

This craft was requested by the United States of Kerbin to have a short take off naval fighter. Forward swept wings meant increased turning rate and can perform high g turns. With the engine pre-coolers, it can turn the oxygen in the air to liquid oxygen to increased performance

Cost: ~30,000 Roots

Download

http://kerbalx.com/ouion/XF-Excleus

Edited May 3, 2015 by ouion
